item.title: CVE-2024-49605|2024-10-20T10:06:47.987Z -- avchat.net -- avchat%20video%20chat
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Avchat.Net AVChat Video Chat allows Stored XSS.This issue affects AVChat Video Chat: from n/a through 2.2.
